level.heading: Penalty.
level.text: A person violating a regulation prescribed under this chapter shall be fined under Title 18 [of the U.S. Code] or imprisoned for not more than 30 days. A separate violation occurs under this section for each day the violation continues.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "Title 18," referred to in this section, is Title 18 of the U.S. Code.
